appetizers.name: Hot Wings
appetizers.description: deep-fried un-breaded chicken wings or drumsticks coated with a vinegar-and-cayenne-pepper hot sauce mixed with butter

appetizers.name: Cheese Bread
appetizers.description: t's a semi-soft cheese traditionally made with reindeer milk, but several American cheesemakers have adapted the Finnish original to create a pasteurized cow's milk version

Cold Sandwiches.name: The Philly
Cold Sandwiches.description: It is a sandwich made of thinly sliced beef — usually frozen chip steak — cooked on a griddle and served on a sliced roll with cheese and either wit or witout onions.

Cold Sandwiches.name: The Outlaw
Cold Sandwiches.description: The Outlaw: Juicy steak topped with a double helping of Pepper Jack cheese, green peppers, red onions, and Baja Chipotle sauce

hot sandwiches.name: meatball
hot sandwiches.description: The sandwich primarily consists of meatballs, a tomato sauce or marinara sauce, and bread, such as Italian bread, baguette and bread rolls.

hot sandwiches.name: chicken sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: A boneless breast of chicken seasoned to perfection, freshly breaded, pressure cooked in 100% refined peanut oil and served on a toasted.

desserts.name: apple pie
desserts.description: double-crusted, with pastry both above and below the filling; the upper crust may be solid or latticed (woven of crosswise strips).

desserts.name: pecan pie
desserts.description: a mix of sweet, buttery crunch with a savory nutty aftertaste

drinks.name: margarita
drinks.description: cocktail made of tequila, lime or lemon juice, and an orange-flavored liqueur, usually served in a salt-rimmed glass.

drinks.name: mojito
drinks.description: a cocktail made with rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint.
